biotools.summary: xREI is a web interface that allows users to explore a range of predefined phylo-grammars or create their own phylo-grammar. Grammars are visualized via state transition graphs and substitution matrices. xREI is based on xrate, the flexible software tool for modeling structural and phylogenetic variation in multiple sequence alignments.
